pkgmetadata.longdescription: # 乐白机器人 Python SDK## 使用说明```pip install lebai```[API 文档](https://docs.lebai.ltd/sdk/python/)- `LebaiRobot`：提供乐白机器人API的python调用接口。## 示例```pythonimport mathfrom lebai import LebaiRobot, CartesianPose, JointPosedef run(): rb = LebaiRobot("192.168.3.218") rb.start_sys() rb.movej(JointPose(0, -1.2, math.pi / 6, 0, math.pi / 4, 0), 0, 0, 1, 0) base = rb.get_actual_tcp_pose() p2 = CartesianPose(0.1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, base=base) rb.movel(p2, 0, 0, 1, 0) rb.stop_sys()if __name__ == '__main__': run()```## 版本要求- Python >= 3.7安装依赖：```bashpip install grpcio protobuf~=3.19.4 requests```
